title: Trylle Trilogy Boxed Set
description: She must dare to be different to unlock the key to her past.  When Wendy Everly was six, her mother was convinced she was a monster and tried to kill her. 11 years later, when do you discovers her mother was almost right. She's not the person she's always believed to self to be, and her whole life begins to unravel - all because of Finn Holmes. Finn is a darkly handsome newcomer and every encounter with him leave so deeply shaken... Though it has more to do with her fierce attraction to him than she ever admit.  He's also here to tell her the shocking truth: Wendy is a changing who is switched birth- and he's come to take her home. Now Wendy is about to journey to a magical world she never knew existed, one that is both beautiful and frightening. And she must leave her old life behind to discover who she is meant to become ...Includes short story Ever After (Trylle), extract of Frost Fire (Kanin Chronicles) and extract of Wake (Watersong)
author: Amanda Hocking
